DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate whether two intradermal ( ID ) vaccine delivery device safely precisely inject liquid intradermal layer skin three different injection location
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Performance Safety Two Intradermal Delivery Devices .
DOC.detailed_description: This study preliminary device safety performance evaluation healthy adult volunteer ( age 18-55 year ) . Each participant receive six injection 0.1 ml sterile saline solution skin : - Upper deltoid side-load ID adapter - Upper deltoid autodisable ( AD ) ID adapter - Suprascapular ( behind shoulder ) side-load ID adapter - Suprascapular AD ID adapter - Forearm side-load ID adapter - Forearm AD ID adapter Intradermal administration injection assess : - The liquid remain surface skin blot absorbent paper amount liquid present record . - The formation intradermal wheal observe , diameter wheal measure use ruler similar measurement tool . - A photo injection site take . Injections assess safety observation injection sit local adverse event .
DOC.criteria: Female male participant age 18 55 year . Healthy enough participate clinical trial per site investigator assessment . Healthy skin upper deltoid , suprascapular , forearm region ( side body ) . Able provide sign informed consent understand study procedure per ICH/GCP guideline . Literate English . Available telephone 48 hour study visit . Skin abnormalities upper deltoid , suprascapular , forearm region either side body ( scar , rash , infection ) , tattoo injection site , skin condition would interfere ability visualize intradermal injection opinion investigator .
